comments:
ConcurrentModificationException get thrown when performing TPTP analysis.

Build : tptp.sdk-TPTP-4.3.0-200609271134.zip

Import two access and error logs.
Import two Symptom Catalogs (attached with this defect)
Open log view with access.log
select 1 event from the log view
Right click on the selected event and select "Analyze Setting ..."
Select "Symptom Database" tab
Only select one (1st) Symptom Catalog.
Cilck OK
Performa selected Events TPTP analysis
Now open error.log in the log view
select 1 event from the log view
Right click on the selected event and select "Analyze Setting ..."
Select "Symptom Database" tab
Only select one (2st) Symptom Catalog.
Cilck OK
Performa selected Events TPTP analysis
Observe error log page.
Following error get thrown.

*** Bug 160080 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
The problem is that the code removes elements from a list while iterating over the same list.  This has been fixed.

(In reply to comment #3)
> The problem is that the code removes elements from a list while iterating over
